subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: D.C. United’s Jaime Moreno missed a penalty kick for the first time in five tries this season, allowing the Red Bulls to extend their unbeaten streak to six games with a 0-0 tie in a Major League Soccer game in Washington on Saturday. The Red Bulls (8-6-8) are 3-0-3 in that stretch.
